articles.title: Where you can still buy the latest Apple Watch - CNN
articles.description: Now that the White House declined to overturn the ITC ruling, Apple can no longer sell its newest Apple Watch in America. The rule applies to Apple Watch Series 9 and Apple Watch Ultra 2, among other newer models, because they violate patents registered to an…
articles.content:
After an unfavorable US International Trade Commission ruling, Apple is no longer selling its Apple Watch Series 9 and Apple Watch Ultra 2 in the United States because of a patent dispute.

articles.title: Americans opened their wallets for holiday spending, defying fears of a pullback - CBS News
articles.description: U.S. economy continues to plow ahead, as holiday shoppers shell out more on gifts this year than predicted.
articles.content:
Shoppers weren't entirely tight fisted during the holiday season, despite the ongoing pressure of inflation on household budgets.
